ProductInfo.Features:
Support the six operation working simultaneously, recording, playback, network transmission, backup, mobile phone surveillance and interface operating
With H.264 video compression for main profile
The main recorder is with 2 x USB port which support Mouse, U disk and USB portable hard drive disk
Support Window Mobile, Symbian, Android, iPhone, BlackBerry
Come with a dynamic domain name, don't need to apply for it. Automatically through the router, do not need to manually map the ports
